name: Sandra Bright
about: Sandra appeared in the 2015 series of the Big Allotment Challenge.

She was first introduced to gardening by her father and now spends much of her time on her green-fingered hobby. Owning over four acres of land, six chicken sheds, paddocks and a huge garden, most of Sandra’s time is spent at home, where she looks after her 80 chickens, seven ducks, three cats and a few goats.
